attributes.review: Trumpity trumpity scares the living bits out of me 🥰 hopefully I won’t be assaulted next buddy. Wow so strong so powerful you hid in a bunker while the world collapsed. What a cutie pie 💃 next time do something for our country ✨
This is the worst app I’ve ever used. This app is full of disgusting lies and comments full of hate. Anyone that uses this app is being brain washed to believe in hate.
